column5: I am sorry to hear of your fathers passing. I am sure the memories that he left behind brings joy to the people who were fortunant enough to know him.  Art
My condolences to you and your family on the passing of your father.  John
John my thoughts and prayers are with you and your family
So sorry for your loss, my condolences to you and your family.
Sorry for your loss John...  Maureen
Sorry for your loss Buddy... Take care and a safe trip back home.. TTYs
Sorry for your loss,celebrate his life and memories,its what you would want your kids to do. Joe
sorry to hear this my friend... but his pain is gone, and  him & your Mum are catching up now please accept condoleneces from both Andrea & I
Sorry for your loss...I know how tough it is to lose your Dad, it will be 4 years wednesday since I lost mine.
So sorry about your loss John, please accept our condolences !!
Condolences to you and your family John.
very sorry to hear of your loss.  take care  doug

I don't know who the author is but I hope this brings you some comfort:  If He Could  He would be here if he could, To help relieve your sorrow. And he would tell you: "Time will heal, Though maybe not tomorrow".  He would be here if he could, To comfort you in grieving. And he would tell you: "I'm at peace, Don't fret about my leaving".  He would be here if he could, But he has given you his best. And now after years of giving, Its' time for him to rest. ________________________________  Our condolences to you and your family John.  Cliff & Sue
Sorry to hear the news John. Have a drink or 2 for him, and be glad for him that his suffering is over.
Thoughts and prayers are with you and your family John.
I'm sorry to hear of your sad news, John. Please accept my condolences.  Whopper

Very sincere heartfelt thanks to each and everyone of you who make up this amazing community. Thank you for your thoughts, kind words and prayers.  Although I am very fortunate to be able to return to the UK 2 or 3 times a year, it is painfully difficult to "see" someone you love and respect lose their battle with this dreadful disease inch by inch, from 3,000 miles away.  As many of you said, he is at peace with the one he loved dearly.  John & Barbara........
Our condolences on the loss of your Father.
I'm very sorry to hear of your fathers passing John, all my condolences to you and your family  Sean

We lost my Dad over the weekend. The world will be a lesser place without him.  As some of you knew, he had been battling lung cancer. Against all odds he managed to live with it for a year and a half and had a pretty good quality of life. We talked practically daily and his quick witted sense of humour continued strong until the last week or so when he deteriorated quite rapidly. As he hadn't been able to eat or talk for a few days, his passing on was a blessing.  Dad had selflessly dedicated 8 1/2 of the last 10 years of his life to taking care of my Mom who had many health problems. Eventually she passed away from complications associated with her illness. He never really got over losing her and talked often about their being together once again.  Although I will be away in the UK for the next couple of weeks I hope to still get to the Firehall tomorrow night to have a beer or two in his honour.  John....

John,  So sorry to hear this news!  Our thoughts are with you and your family.  Cancer is a horrible disease...and you are right, when the suffering is too much to bear, it is a blessing when they pass.  Take care, Cliff and Carole
John,  so sorry here to here about your loss. You and your family are in our thoughts and prayers during this hard time.   Peps
I'm sorry to hear of your sad news, John.  Please accept my condolences.
John, we are so sorry to hear of this news...  you have our condolences  Shelley and Chuck
Sorry about your loss.  Marc
oh so sorry to hear about your dad!  my condelences to you and your family.
That's just terrible news John.  My heart goes out to you and your family.  Your dad sounded like a very wonderfull, selfless man.  The apple doesn't fall far from the tree.  Sorry bud.  Joey
My condolences to you and your family. God Bless
Sorry to hear, John.  Cancer is certainly a terrible thing for any family to deal with.
So sorry for your loss.  You and your family will be in my prayers  dk

My condolances John,  This really hits home. I lost my Dad this January to Lung Cancer. Few words can be said, and none will make it o.k. Cancer is the battle that should be forefront in our lives, before all else.   Mark.
My condolances John,  Regards, Sam
Sorry to hear of your loss John.  My condolances to you and the family.
My condolences to you and your family. Battling cancer is brutal, he can now rest.
Sorry to hear it John.
Very sorry for the loss of your father John.
My condolences John, hang tough.
So sorry to hear the news John.
My condolences John. It's hard to lose anyone, but when they are suffering it just may be the best way. I've been there.
My condolences John.  I too lost my Dad to lung cancer and I know the last little while is pretty tough.  He's at peace with your Mom now.  Jim
sorry for your loss
Hi John,  Please accept my condolences on the passing of your Dad. Thoughts and prayers will be with you and your family.  Sincerely, Jim

Hello John.  Have enjoyed reading your posts. Sorry about your Dad. Hope the best wishes of your friends helps you in your grief. You are obviously someone a lot of people care about.  God Bless, and have a safe trip.
My thoughts and prayers to you and your family...  Jen
